subject: Fund B vs. CGML : Margin Notice
content:
Dear  all,

								
								
Pursuant to the agreement between you and Fund B we hereby give a notice of following margin call requirements ; 

	
								
MARGIN CALL SUMMARY 

	 

	 

						
Close of Business of

	9.11.2018

						
All figures are from Fund B perspective

				
								
MTM Exposure                                   

	-5.143.741,83

	USD

					
Threshold                                           

	0,00

	USD

					
Collateral Balance                            

	-5.607.612,00

	EUR

					
Net Margin Call Requirement          

	1.210.000,00

	USD

					
								
Fund B is due to receive USD 1,210,000  

							
Please confirm our margin call requirement and advise the settlement date.

						
								

 

Regards,

 

xxxx xxxxx

xxxxxxxx@xxxxxx.xxx

+11 111 111 11 11
